briefTitle: Stress Management and Biological Age in Breast Cancer Patients.RCT
officialTitle: Psychological and Biological Outcomes in Breast Cancer Patients After Pythagorean Self-Awareness Intervention.
conditions: Stress, Breast Cancer, Telomere Length, Mean Leukocyte
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of primary breast cancer
* Completion of anticancer therapy (except for hormonal therapy)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Psychiatric diagnosis and treatment
* Metastasis
* Previous participation in any stress management and health promotion study
* Inability to read or write in Greek
